sentences.en: " Flee? Where to? " he asked himself.
sentences.cn: “ 逃,逃到 什么 地方去 呢 ? ” 他开始觉得事情并不是好玩的了.

sentences.en: a camp for refugees fleeing from the war
sentences.cn: 收留战争难民的难民营

sentences.en: A trickle of refugees began to flee the country.
sentences.cn: 难民开始三五成群地陆续逃离该国。

sentences.en: Citizens were forced to flee the besieged city.
sentences.cn: 居民被迫逃离这座被围困的城市.

sentences.en: Follow love , and it will flee ; flee love , and it will follow thee.
sentences.cn: 求之不得, 不求自来.

sentences.en: For an instant, Catherine was tempted to flee.
sentences.cn: 有那么一会儿，凯瑟琳很想逃跑。

sentences.en: He was lucky to flee the burning hotel.
sentences.cn: 他很幸运逃出了失火的旅馆.

sentences.en: He was to flee his native village to join the rebel army.
sentences.cn: 他被迫逃离家乡参加了叛军.
袭击他的人转身逃走了。

sentences.en: It is a primitive instinct to flee a place of danger.
sentences.cn: 逃离危险的地方是一种原始本能。

sentences.en: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多难民被迫逃离了祖国。

sentences.en: Masaari spent six months in prison before fleeing the country .
sentences.cn: 正有蹲了六个月监狱，然后逃出了该国。

sentences.en: She would get up and flee in silent terror.
sentences.cn: 她爬起来,在寂静的恐怖中逃循.

sentences.en: The criminal was tipped off to flee in time.
sentences.cn: 有人泄密给罪犯,使他及时逃走了.

sentences.en: The family were forced to flee with their infant son.
sentences.cn: 那家人被迫带着他们尚在襁褓中的儿子逃走了。

sentences.en: The railway station was swamped with thousands of families trying to flee the city.
sentences.cn: 火车站挤满了成千上万想要逃离这座城市的家庭。

sentences.en: Truly, as it was written long ago : " The wicked flee when no man pursueth. "
sentences.cn: 古语说得好: “ 作贼心虚. ”

sentences.en: Why does she always flee any kind of responsibility?
sentences.cn: 她为什么总是逃避责任?

trans.tran_en: to leave somewhere very quickly, in order to escape from danger
